cars.description: This Mini Cooper comes with a moonroof/sunroof, keyless remote entry, and with only 30,000 miles on it.
This brand new Tesla Model 3 comes with a 5-star safety rating, 0 to 60 mph under 6 seconds, and is available early 2017.
This Subaru has 64,525 miles on it, is AWD, and has heated.
This Vibe comes with air conditioning, CD player, and automatic headlights.
